data.name: UnnyWorld
data.detailed_description:
Challenge other players and dive into the world of space fantasy.

Have you even dreamed to own a planet? Now you can get it! Evolve your planet as you want. Upgrade buildings, improve defense and hire monsters to protect the planet from other players. Or take your sword and use a magic ship to raid other planets.

Are you tired from standard controls? Use a brand new gestures control system : draw all spells right on the screen!

Your team is waiting for you in Arenas! Create your guild and find allies. Become the best and lead your guild to victory.


Features:

· Explore the world of space fantasy.
· Build and evolve your planet.
· Develop the best defense using walls, towers and monsters.
· Raid other planets to get resources and trophies.
· Select one from 6 unique characters.
· Evolve your character to get new abilities.
· Draw spells on the screen using gestures.
· Compete in real-time PvP battles.
· Team up with your friends to fight in Arenas.
· Complete achievements to get great rewards.

data.short_description:
Challenge other players and dive into the world of space fantasy.

Have you even dreamed to own a planet? Evolve your planet as you want. Upgrade buildings, improve defense and hire monsters to protect the planet from other players. Or take your sword and use a magic ship to raid other planets.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: x86-compatible 800MHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible 3D graphics with at least 64MB of addressable memory (such as an ATI Radeon 7200, NVIDIA GeForce 2, or Intel GMA 950)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: x86-compatible 800MHz processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible 3D graphics with at least 64MB of addressable memory (such as an ATI Radeon 7200, NVIDIA GeForce 2, or Intel GMA 950)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Max OS X or later
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Max OS X or later
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
